t: Batch-Based Architecture - High Performance Computing Lens
s: AWS Batch is a fully managed service that enables you to run large-scale compute workloads in the cloud without provisioning resources or managing schedulers. AWS Batch enables developers, scientists, and engineers to easily and efficiently run hundreds of thousands of batch computing jobs on AWS.
